snippet: An arrest warrant has been issued for a man that Afghan officials say is an American and part of a Special Forces unit operating in Wardak Province.
abstract: Afghan authorities are seeking arrest on murder and torture charges of Zakaria Kandahari, man they say is American and part of Special Forces unit operating in Wardak Province.

byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi contributed reporting from Kabul, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: An arrest warrant has been issued for a man that Afghan officials say is an American and part of a Special Forces unit operating in Wardak Province.

headline.seo: Afghans Say an American Tortured Civilians
headline.main: Afghans Say an American Tortured Civilians
headline.print_headline: Afghans Say an American Tortured Civilians
